channel.title: Ring of stone code not working..?

item.title: Ring of stone code not working..?
item.dc:creator: @lungxapples lungxapples
item.description:
@lungxapples wrote:

Well it somewhat works now… just a few issues i don’t like
1.)It doesn’t go off when you put ring on it goes off when you try to take ring off then it operates into stone.
2.)The ring doesn’t come off unless you put on another ring.
3.)Even if ring of stone is off Your still a rock? lol

if (wearID == 6583 && quest2 == 6) { npcId = 2626; npcId2 = 2626; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; return; }

This is the code i have.
